resources.string:
TuxCalculator uses the following OpenSource libraries:
 The scala library as well as the scala combinator parsing module: https://www.scala-lang.org/
 big-math: https://eobermuhlner.github.io/big-math/
 commons-lang: https://commons.apache.org/lang/
 commons-text: https://commons.apache.org/text/
 Icon from pixabay: https://pixabay.com/vectors/calculator-red-flat-design-1432526/
